mapper.insert: INSERT member(memId, memPwd, memName, memEmail, memHp, memZipcode, memAddress1, memAddress2, memNick, memImgNo, pointX, pointY, memCtg) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memEmail},#{memHp}, #{memZipcode}, #{memAddress1}, #{memAddress2}, #{memNick}, #{memImgNo}, #{pointX}, #{pointY}, #{memCtg})
mapper.select: select memId from member where memId = #{memId}
select memNick from member where memNick = #{memNick}
select memPwd, memNick, memEmail, memImgNo from member where memId = #{memId}
mapper.update: update member set memImgNo=#{fileName} where memId = #{memId}
update member set memNick=#{memNick}, memHp=#{memHp}, memName=#{memName}, memEmail=#{memEmail}, memZipcode=#{memZipcode}, memAddress1=#{memAddress1}, memAddress2=#{memAddress2} where memId = #{memId}
